# File: Thai_ThaiSemi.txt
# Generated from CLDR
#

# The rules that convert space into semicolon are in this file;
# since they have to come BEFORE the break iterator.
$thai = [[:thai:] ก-\u0E3Aเ-๛] ;
$thai { ' ' } $thai → '; ' ;
